html:
roaring of the sea. The children of Zion, armed with the Spirit and his gifts and possessing great priesthood powers, are mightier than the great roaring of the earth's oceans. The repetition of roaring is suggestive of that power.

land. The land of the wicked will contain great sin and wickedness to the point of "darkness and sorrow." The spiritual light from heaven will not be found among the unrighteous because it will be centered on Zion's people and their temples.
